title: "“Knowledge-as-a-service” platform Lynk lands funding from UBS’ Investment Bank"
excerpt: "Lynk, the “knowledge-as-a-service” platform with more than 840,000 experts, announced today it has added $5 million raised from UBS’ Investment Bank division to its previously announced Series B. This brings the round’s new total to $29 million."
